participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emily finds joy in family life and enjoys expressing herself through writing.
participant_1.background: I'm not the best at keeping up with my chores, but I try to do my laundry once a week. My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog. I have 5 children. My favorite book is David Copperfield. My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and grounded, Daniel balances his love for music with the demands of his accounting job.
participant_2.background: I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else. I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer. I work in accounting. I play many instruments. I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. I love the way Fitzgerald captures the decadence of the Roaring Twenties.
I've heard great things about that book! I've been meaning to pick it up.
I highly recommend it. What's your favorite thing about your home?
My home is my sanctuary. It's a place where I can relax and be myself.
That's great! I feel the same way about my home.
I also have five kids. They keep me busy, but I love them to death.
I have a dog, Petrucci, who I love more than anything else.
Dogs are the best! I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life.
Me too. My family is my rock.
What do you do for a living?
I'm an accountant. I love my job, but it can be stressful.
I can imagine! I'm a stay-at-home mom. I love it, but it can also be stressful.
I'm sure it can! But it sounds like you have a great life.
I do! I'm grateful for everything I have.
